text: Richard Peter Vande Hoef (May 15, 1925 â€“ December 20, 2020) was an American politician. Vande Hoef was born in Boyden, Iowa. He was a member of the Iowa Senate from 1981 to 1993 and State House of Representatives from 1993 to 1999. Vande Hoef was a member of the Republican Party. Vande Hoef died on December 20, 2020 in Sibley, Iowa at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard Vande Hoef
